title: Game crash
body: Game crashes after champ select, every game is crash

replies.body:
now i have leaver buster very nice

it sais lost conecction even i have internet, i treid to reinstall and repair doesnt work, i dont have any third part programs{{champion:133}}
That's pretty frustrating, but I'd like to help!  Are you getting any error messages?  Are you also running any third party programs that interact with league, like play.tv?  Let me know!
